name: i-Free
overview:
i-Free is a Russian innovation company which has operated in the CIS since 2001 and internationally since 2006. i-Freeâ€™s focus is on pioneering projects in mobile and NFC technology, electronic finance, digital content distribution, electronic payments and micropayments, applications for smartphones and new network devices, B2C digital product marketing and B2B mobile marketing. Outside Russia, i-Free operates and has offices in Kiev (Ukraine), Minsk (Belarus), Almaty (Kazakhstan), Mumbai (India), Beijing (China) and San-Paolo (Brazil). i-Free products and services are available in more than 100 countries. i-Free grossed over RUR3 billion (close to US $1000 million) in sales in 2009.
Headquartered are located in St. Petersburg but i-Free also has an office in Moscow. The company currently employs more than 350 staff. i-Free partners with the leading mobile operators in Russia and the CIS, with international mobile equipment vendors, banks, transnational brands, major media groups, publishers and online resources.
